00012 typedef struct rctree3_node_s {
00013   uintptr_t id;
00014 
00015   /* TODO (Space Opt.): Pack the following 3 words into 1 word. */
00016   uintptr_t sing;
00017   uintptr_t final;
00018   uintptr_t dice;
00019 
00020   /* TODO (Space Opt.): Pack the following 2 modrefs. */
00021   modref_t* desc;
00022   modref_t* slots;
00023 
00024   modref_t* data;
00025 } rctree3_node_t;
00026 
00027 typedef struct rctree3_slots_s {
00028   uintptr_t degree;
00029   modref_t* slotv[3];
00030   
00031   /* Slot i holds either:
00032    *  (rctree3_edge_t*) modref ---  if (i < degree)
00033    *  NULL / data modref       ---  otherwise.
00034    */
00035 } rctree3_slots_t;
00036 
00037 typedef struct rctree3_edge_s {
00038 
00039   modref_t* node;   /* (rctree3_node_t*) */
00040   modref_t* mirror; /* (rctree3_edge_t*) */
00041 
00042   /* TODO (Space Opt.): Pack the following 1 modrefs. */
00043   modref_t* desc;   /* (rctree3_edge_t*) */
00044   
00045   modref_t* data;
00046 } rctree3_edge_t;
00047 
00048 /* == Data Operations == */
00049 typedef struct rctree3_app_s {
00050   const char* name;
00051   modref_t* (*gen_node_data)(int degree);
00052   modref_t* (*gen_edge_data)();
00053   
00054   afun (*finalize)    (rctree3_node_t* node,
00055                        rctree3_slots_t* slots,
00056                        modref_t* node_data,
00057                        modref_t* scar_data_0,
00058                        modref_t* scar_data_1,

00062

00064                     rctree3_slots_t* slots,
00065                     modref_t* node_data,
00066                     modref_t* edge_data,
00067                     modref_t* scar_data_0,
00068                     modref_t* scar_data_1,
00069                     modref_t* scar_data_dest);
00070

00072                     rctree3_slots_t* slots,

00074                     modref_t* edge_data_0,

00076                     modref_t* scar_data,
00077                     modref_t* edge_data_dest);
00078 
00079

00081                           rctree3_slots_t* slots,

00098                           modref_t* node_data,

00102                           modref_t* edge_data_dest);
00103

00105   void (*print_final_data)(modref_t* final_data, FILE* file);
00106   void (*print_edge_data)(modref_t* edge_data, FILE* file);
00107 } rctree3_app_t;
